movies.title: The Olsen Gang Runs Amok
movies.plot: When Egon Olsen gets out of Vridsløselille State Prison once again, his friends Benny and Kjeld do not want to know about his new, ingenious plan. They are actually WORKING in a grocery store! Thus, he has to come up with a different way to get his hands on the money of some international gangster.
movies.simplePlot: When Egon Olsen gets out of Vridsløselille State Prison once again, his friends Benny and Kjeld do not want to know about his new, ingenious plan. They are actually WORKING in a grocery ...

biography.bio: Ove Sprogøe was one of Denmark's finest and most treasured actors. Born in 1919 in Odense, where he also grew up, his parents were Arthur and Inger Sprogøe. He married his wife Eva in 1945, the same year as his stage debut at Folketeatret in Copenhagen. Through a long career in film, television and theatre, his most famous role was as Egon Olsen in the film series "Olsenbanden". The characters and the 14 films are common ground for all Danes and also became popular in Germany as well as in Norway and Sweden where local versions were produced. Even so, Sprogøe was always able to maintain a diverse range as an actor, playing all genres on stage as well as on screen. This included a multitude of popular comedies, a recurring role in the popular series Matador (1978) and a great number of variety shows. Ove Sprogøe died in the fall of 2004 and is remembered as one of the true greats of Danish film.
biography.name: Ove Sprogøe

biography.bio: Born in Odense, Denmark on December 9th, 1934, Morten Grunwald is "World famous in Denmark" for several popular film roles. Most famous, however, will always be his Benny in all of the "Olsen Banden" films, where he starred alongside Ove Sprogøe and Poul Bundgaard. He attended Odense Theatrical School in 1958 and graduated from The Royal Theater of Denmark's Theatrical School in 1962. Since 1971, he has been the director of several theatres in Copenhagen: Bristol Teatret (1971-1980), Betty Nansen Teatret (1980-1992), Østre Gasværk (1992-1998).
biography.name: Morten Grunwald

biography.bio: Poul Bundgaard was born on October 27, 1922 in Hellerup, Denmark as Poul Arne Bundgaard. He was an actor, known for The Last Exploits of the Olsen Gang (1974), The Olsen Gang in a Fix (1969) and The Olsen Gang Sees Red (1976). He was married to Kirsten Pedersen and Kjær, Bente Elisabeth. He died on June 3, 1998 in Gentofte, Denmark.
biography.name: Poul Bundgaard

biography.bio: Kirsten Walther was born on August 31, 1933 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), The Last Exploits of the Olsen Gang (1974) and The Olsen Gang Sees Red (1976). She was married to Palle Wolfsberg. She died on February 19, 1987 in Søllerød, Denmark.
biography.name: Kirsten Walther

biography.bio: Preben Kaas was born on March 30, 1930 in Aalborg, Denmark. He was an actor and writer, known for Martha (1967), Where Is the Body, Moeller? (1971) and Two Crazy Guys (1961). He was married to Lisbet Dahl, Anne Mari Lie, Ulla Larsen and Bodil Nymark Nielsen. He died on March 27, 1981 in Denmark.
biography.name: Preben Kaas

biography.bio: Strøbye was most famous for his comedy roles, as the confused uncle in Min søsters børn (My sisters Children) and the hustler Gyldenkål in Familien Gyldenkål (The Goldcabbage Family). But his biggest role and success was in Matador the TV series a lawyer Skjold Hansen, he started his acting career and education as an actor at Det Kongelige Teater (The Royal Danish theater), he also worked at Folketeatret (The peoples theater). Strøbye made his movie debut in Nåler 1951 and his last role was in 1998, as the aging inspector in the legendary Olsen Banden movies.
biography.name: Axel Strøbye

biography.bio: Birgitte Federspiel was born on September 6, 1925 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She was an actress, known for Babette's Feast (1987), Hunger (1966) and L'étranger frappe à la porte (1959). She was married to Freddy Koch, Henning Ahrensborg and Jens Østerholm. She died on February 2, 2005 in Odense, Denmark.
biography.name: Birgitte Federspiel

biography.bio: Ejner Federspiel was born on August 12, 1896 in Denmark. He was an actor, known for The Olsen Gang Sees Red (1976), Story of Barbara (1967) and Harry et son valet (1961). He was married to Gunver Fønss. He died on November 24, 1981 in Denmark.
biography.name: Ejner Federspiel

biography.bio: Jesper Langberg was born on October 20, 1940 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is an actor, known for Stolen Spring (1993), King's Game (2004) and Possessed (1999). He was previously married to Eva Jensen, Hanne Mørup and Susanne Heinrich.
biography.name: Jesper Langberg

biography.bio: Arthur Jensen was born on November 9, 1897 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He was an actor, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), The Olsen Gang's Big Score (1972) and The Torndal Cousins (1973). He died on November 28, 1981 in Gentofte, Denmark.
biography.name: Arthur Jensen

biography.bio: Helle Virkner was born on September 15, 1925 in Århus, Denmark as Helle Genie Lotinga. She was an actress, known for Huset på Christianshavn (1970), Flickering Lights (2000) and Det støver stadig (1962). She was married to Jens Otto Krag, Ebbe Rode and William Rosenberg. She died on June 10, 2009 in Charlottenlund, Denmark.
biography.name: Helle Virkner

biography.bio: Benny Hansen was born on February 22, 1944 in Denmark. He was an actor, known for Valhalla (1986), Jungle Jack 2: La star de la jungle (1996) and Alle I unge elskende (1962). He died on August 27, 1998.
biography.name: Benny Hansen

biography.bio: Jes Holtsø was born on December 30, 1956 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is known for his work on Huset på Christianshavn (1970), The Olsen Gang Sees Red (1976) and The Last Exploits of the Olsen Gang (1974).
biography.name: Jes Holtsø
